head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths HAGERTY, MARGARET MACAULEY

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths HAGERTY, MARGARET MACAULEY

block.p: HAGERTY-Margaret Macauley. On September 23, 2000. Beloved wife of the late Edward F. Hagerty. Loving mother of Sarah H. Sweetser, Edward F. Jr., Anne C., Jeanette H. Clonan, Patricia H. Snyder, Eileen R. and the late Margaret H. Shenton. Devoted grandmother of 19 grandchildren and four great-grandchildren. Family will receive friends at John J. Fox Funeral Home in Larchmont, NY, Monday, 2-4 and 7-9 PM. Mass Tuesday, 10 AM, at Sts. John and Paul Church in Larchmont. Interment private.
